title: King of the Hammers - Vindication (2013)
description:
Over 130 racers and teams assembled in Johnson Valley, California to do battle in the desert and race for the coveted title of King through some of the most difficult rock trails in the world, and vast expanses of harsh desert. With 160 miles between them and the checkered flag, the competition would be fierce. In addition to unlimited class racing, the KOH Every Man Challenge in Stock and Modified Class would also take to the desert in search of an overall victor.






If you enjoy what you watched, support the sport and BUY IT: www.kohthemovie.com
